Detailed Description

Function Documentation

int32_t CSL_hyperbusSetCSBaseAddr ( CSL_hyperbus_coreRegs *  pCoreRegs,
uint32_t  mbarIndex,
uint32_t  hyperbusCSBaseAddr 
)

Set the MSB 8bits of the base address of addressable region to the HyperBus memory.

Parameters
pCoreRegs[IN] Pointer to IP Register Overlay
mbarIndex[IN] MBAR index
hyperbusCSBaseAddr[IN] Base address to be set
Returns
CSL_PASS if successful and CSL_EFAIL otherwise
int32_t CSL_hyperbusSetWriteProtection ( CSL_hyperbus_coreRegs *  pCoreRegs,
uint32_t  writeProtect 
)

Set the value of WriteProtect.

This function set the value of the WP field of the WPR register

Parameters
pCoreRegs[IN] Pointer to IP Register Overlay
writeProtect[IN] Value of the write protection field to be written, Refer CSL_WriteProtectionControl
Returns
CSL_PASS if successful, CSL_EFAIL otherwise.
